solution_line_template: The movie that is being replayed {num_replays} times takes {movie_length_hours} x {num_replays} = <<{num_replays}*{movie_length_hours}={total_movie_hours}>>{total_movie_hours} hours.
The advertisements before the start of the movie take {ad_length_minutes} x {num_replays} = <<{ad_length_minutes}*{num_replays}={total_ad_minutes}>>{total_ad_minutes} minutes in all.
One hundred twenty minutes is equal to {total_ad_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_ad_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_ad_hours}>>{total_ad_hours} hours.
Thus, the movie theater operates for {total_movie_hours} + {total_ad_hours} = <<{total_movie_hours}+{total_ad_hours}={total_operating_hours}>>{total_operating_hours} hours each day.
